name: THE VERY LAST tote bag of 'king of the allotments
description:
this is the very last tote bag i have of 'king of the allotments'.

it was an edition of 10.

due to this being the very last one, i'll be adding in some freebies!

name: original drawing of 'the allotment workers'
description:
original drawing of 'the allotment workers'

A4 in size.

Drawn during research for 'the allotment series'.

name: original drawing of 'one does not wash one's dirty linen in public'
description:
original drawing of 'one does not wash one's dirty linen in public'.

A4 original drawing.

The prints of this all sold out so this is the only, and original one left.

Part of the 'all will come out in the washing' series.

clothing lines in the back garden: possibly the most personal insight into your neighbour's life. 

there was that jumper she wore when she met her husband back in '89 that's too sentimental to throw away. the towel she bought for ibiza last year that got no further than her house as she decided she was too old for such holidays. his favourite socks that are, to his dismay, getting thin at the toes. hung up next to them are those trousers with the knee patches. the tea towel with the coffee stain that just won't come out, but she's kept as it was her mother's. then there's those soft white baby grows that are drying, to be placed neatly in the drawer, ready for the new arrival in a month.

lives behind closed doors interest me, but the snippets of those lives we see on window ledges, thrown away in streets, sold at car boot sales, given to charity shops, and hung up on washing lines interest me even more.

name: set of 6 original allotment drawings
description:
set of 6 original allotment drawing used to make the allotment zine.

each A7 in size.

name: original drawing of calton hill in edinburgh
description:
Original drawing of Calton Hill as seen in the Edinburgh Festivals Magazine.

A5 in size.
